pages.text: That's still a simple $(n)semi-auto$() farm for crops that can be destroyed by $(item)Water$() (like $(item)Wheat$(), $(item)Potatoes$(), $(item)Carrots$(),...). $(br2)(The glass is to illustrate the construction) $(br)$(li)Flipping the $(item)Lever$() causes the $(item)Pistons$() to lower, allowing $(item)Water$() to flow down over the fields and flushing the drops into a $(item)Hopper$() to a $(item)Chest$().
This farm can be expanded infinitely downwards.
pages.title: Semi-auto Wheat Farm
